import React, { Component } from 'react' import backIcon from '../images/Back-Icon.png' import axios from 'axios' import IndividualRepresentative from './IndividualRepresentative'; export default class Representatives extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { senator1 : null, senator2 : null, houserep : null, }; } async GetRepNames() { let payload = {'street': this.props.constituent['street'], 'city' : this.props.constituent['city'], 'zipcode' : this.props.constituent['zipcode']} const params = new URLSearchParams(payload); console.log('bing4523523') let res = await axios.get( `http://127.0.0.1:8000/backend/representatives?${params}`) console.log(res); this.setState({houserep : { district: res.data.house.district, official: res.data.house.officials[0], title: res.data.house.title, ocd_id: res.data.house.ocd_id }, senator1 : { district: res.data.senators.district, official: res.data.senators.officials[0], title: res.data.senators.title, ocd_id: res.data.senators.ocd_id },senator2 : { district: res.data.senators.district, official: res.data.senators.officials[1], title: res.data.senators.title, ocd_id: res.data.senators.ocd_id }}) console.log(this.state.houserep) console.log(this.state.senator1) console.log(this.state.senator2) } componentDidMount() { console.log('bing') this.GetRepNames() } componentDidUpdate() { } render() { return (
